property.name: Object Name
property.description: Any text description that you wish.

property.name: Transparent control
property.description: Indicates whether Alpha Anywhere needs to repaint the background of the control.

property.name: Printable control
property.description: Indicates whether the control should be printed with the form.

property.name: Hide
property.description: When checked the button becomes invisible.

property.name: Left
property.description: Sets the horizontal position of the control.

property.name: Top
property.description: Sets the vertical position of the control.

property.name: Width
property.description: Sets the width of the control.

property.name: Height
property.description: Sets the height of the control.
